positions.title: Software Development Team Lead
responsiblities: Led refactoring of legacy codebase, reducing size by 30% and improving maintainability

positions.title: Full Stack Engineer II & Scrum Master

Developed a scalable payment gateway using Stripe APIs, supporting purchases of multiple modules

positions.title: Full Stack Engineer I

Deployed and managed production infrastructure on AWS, leveraging EC2 for compute, S3 for storage

positions.title: Software Engineer I
responsiblities: Designed and implemented a pipeline (C++) to read video frames using GStreamer framework in Linux

Created and utilized onboarding documentation and training materials to facilitate the productivity of new hires

positions.title: Software Engineering Intern

positions.title: Customer Logistics Management Intern
